import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Button, Container, Nav, Navbar, NavDropdown } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useTranslation } from "react-i18next"; function Header() { const { t, i18n } = useTranslation(); const [isMenuOpen, setIsMenuOpen] = useState(false); const toggleMenu = () => { setIsMenuOpen(!isMenuOpen); }; const [expanded, setExpanded] = useState(false); const toggleNav = () => { setExpanded(!expanded); }; const handleClick = () => { window.scrollTo(0, 0); setExpanded(false); }; const changeLanguage = (lng) => { i18n.changeLanguage(lng); }; return (
